      • listUserDomainMappings

        Collection<String> listUserDomainMappings(String user,
                                        String domain)
                                          throws Exception
        Return the explicit mapping stored for the given user and domain. Return null if no mapping was found
        Parameters:
        user - The username.
        domain - The domain.
        Returns:
        the collection which holds the mappings, or null if no mapping is found.
        Throws:
        Exception
